title: 258: Sobriety & Mommy Wine Culture with Ari Eastman
itunes:title: 258: Sobriety & Mommy Wine Culture with Ari Eastman
description:
The Broads are joined by Ari Eastman to discuss becoming sober. They discuss her journey with alcohol, alcoholic stereotypes in the media, being sober-curious, fears, relationship dynamic, the alcohol industry, mommy wine culture, and a lot more!

ARI EASTMAN:

“Sobrietea with Ari Eastman”podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/sobrietea-with-ari-eastman/id1551240301

Personal Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ari_eastman/

Podcast Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/sobrieteapod/

TikTok: @arieastman
